pli-tv-bu-vb-sk30:2.1: The monks’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk30:5.1: 30. The training rule on even levels
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk30:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk30:6.2: At that time the monks from the group of six received almsfood in a heap. …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk30:7.2: “‘I will receive almsfood on an even level,’ this is how you should train.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk30:8.1: Almsfood is to be received on an even level.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk30:8.2: If a monk receives almsfood in a heap out of disrespect, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk30:9.4: if he is the first offender.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk30:10.1: The tenth training rule is finished.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk30:10.2: The third chapter on arms akimbo is finished.
